about_the_game:
ZHEROS soundtrack features almost 60 minutes of music composed exclusively for the game. The soundtrack was composed by Giovanni Leon Dall'Ò.

Tracks list:

01 - ZHEROS main theme
02 - Mike oddity
03 - We are Screenman, first of all
04 - Singularity enders
05 - Punching symphony
06 - Subterranean Gano blues
07 - Gravity rave
08 - Time, space, chaos
09 - Minions descent
10 - Critical end
11 - The fancy side of the moon
12 - The final shutdown

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 260 / Radeon HD 4000 Series / Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3/i5/i7 1.8 GHz CPU dual-core. AMD 2.0 GHz dual-core.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 TI / Radeon HD 6950
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
